description:
Dash Kazakiri is Gao`s next opponent...and his biggest fan! When Gao comes down with an incurable illness, Dash takes him to a doctor from Magic World. Gao`s sickness gets progressively worse, but he is determined to show Dash the best Buddyfight ever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyogyo! Sonna Masaka na Dai Pinch!!
ギョギョ! そんなマサカな大ピンチ!!
